name: redis-ha-docker-ioredis
description: Redis HA environment with docker-compose and ioredis client

scripts.show:slaves: redis-cli -a redisPassword -p 26381 sentinel slaves mymaster; echo
scripts.show:master: redis-cli -a redisPassword -p 26381 sentinel master mymaster | head -n 7; echo

author: José Ramón Blanco Rey
